metadata.title: Roberto Justo | IT Portfolio
metadata.description: Professional portfolio of Roberto Justo - IT specialist with extensive experience in software development and technology solutions.

home.title: Home
home.heroDescription: Passionate about technology, innovation and creating solutions that make a difference. With years of experience in the IT industry, I transform complex challenges into elegant solutions.
home.summaryText: IT professional with solid experience in software development, systems architecture, and technology solutions. Throughout my career, I have worked on challenging projects across various sectors, always seeking innovation and excellence in every delivery. My approach combines deep technical knowledge with the ability to understand business needs, resulting in solutions that truly add value.

story1.title: Career Beginning
story1.description: First steps in the IT world

personal.title: About Me
personal.subtitle: Get to know my story and trajectory
personal.bio: IT professional passionate about technology and innovation. Throughout my career, I have developed unique skills that allow me to tackle complex challenges with creativity and efficiency.

event2.title: First Internship
event2.description: Joined a tech company as an intern

event4.title: Mid-Level Developer
event4.description: Promoted and took on more responsibilities

project1.name: E-Commerce Platform
project1.description: Complete e-commerce platform with payment integration, inventory management and real-time analytics dashboard.

project2.name: Enterprise CRM System
project2.description: Custom CRM system for a large corporation, improving customer relationship management and sales tracking.

project3.name: Mobile Banking App
project3.description: Native mobile application for digital banking with biometric authentication and real-time transactions.

project4.name: IoT Monitoring Dashboard
project4.description: Real-time monitoring platform for IoT devices with alerting system and data visualization.

project5.name: AI Content Platform
project5.description: Content management platform with AI-powered recommendations and automated categorization.

project6.name: Logistics Management System
project6.description: End-to-end logistics platform for fleet management, route optimization and delivery tracking.

personalSkills.communicationDesc: Clear and effective communication at all levels
personalSkills.adaptabilityDesc: Quick to adapt to new technologies and environments

curiosities.title: Curiosities
curiosities.subtitle: Fun facts and interests about me

item1.title: Coffee Lover
item1.description: I consume approximately 5 cups of coffee per day to fuel my coding sessions.

item2.title: Early Adopter
item2.description: I love testing new technologies and tools as soon as they are released.

item3.title: Open Source
item3.description: I actively contribute to open source projects in my free time.

item4.title: Gaming
item4.description: A strategy game enthusiast, I find parallels between gaming and problem-solving in development.

item5.title: Travel
item5.description: I've visited over 10 countries, and each trip inspires new ideas for my projects.

item6.title: Music
item6.description: I always code with music on. My playlist ranges from lo-fi to electronic.

item7.title: Fitness
item7.description: I believe a healthy body leads to a productive mind. I practice regular exercise.

item8.title: Continuous Learning
item8.description: I dedicate at least 1 hour per day to learning something new in technology.
